```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000) %>% 
  mutate( 
    aisle = factor(aisle),
    aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)
    ) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~n, color = ~aisle, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
